data.text: @EthanMcDowell12 @JessENT2020 Hey Ethan! Congrats on the roll of K.C. in the Bobby Brown Story... everything was on  point except Kevin’s hair was a little shorter and mousy brown....and he had a tan....about two or thee shades tanner sir and you would’ve nailed it. https://t.co/uSHYAKjuWh

@EthanMcDowell12 @JeanetteLaNier No disrespect to you, sir. I'm glad that it resulted in another credit for you. I just didn't see it. But obviously the CD did. I'll definitely be following your career though. 😍
@JessENT2020 @JeanetteLaNier Was it the hair? Or the suit? Either way, I was aiming for the Kevin Costner type. Thank you for watching!
@JeanetteLaNier At all! Kevin Costner was a whole entree back then! https://t.co/ppnscUwQiW
